lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic opened defense of his U.S. Open title with a labored 6-3 5-7 6-2 6-1 win over Poland's Jerzy Janowicz on Monday that brought new concerns about the world number one's fitness.
snippet: Novak Djokovic opened defense of his U.S. Open title with a labored 6-3 5-7 6-2 6-1 win over Poland's Jerzy Janowicz on Monday that brought new concerns about the world number one's fitness....

headline.main: Djokovic Into Second Round but New Concerns Over Fitness
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Into Second Round but New Concerns Over Fitness
